meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! I'm back with another review that's sure to make you go ape!

This time, I'm diving into the world of puzzles and language with Chants of Sennaar. And let me tell you, it's a game that will get your brain cells buzzing and your linguistic skills on fleek!

First off, I've gotta give props to the critics who have been raving about this game. Slant Magazine gave it a score of 70, saying it's an "interesting and impressive game" that feels like "an interactive and particularly creative linguistic anthropology lesson." SpazioGames chimed in with an 80, calling it a "good and immersive puzzle game" with lots of riddles to solve. And Worth Playing gave it an 80, praising its unique translation aspect and challenging puzzles.

Now, I know what you're thinking: What's the big deal about Chants of Sennaar? Well, let me tell you, this game is all about language and culture. You get to explore ancient civilizations, uncover hidden meanings, and solve puzzles that will make you feel like a genius (as God is a Geek put it). It's like being a linguistic detective, trying to figure out the secrets of the past.

But what really sets Chants of Sennaar apart is its emphasis on communication. The game shows us that even when we're from different cultures and speak different languages, there are still ways to connect and understand each other. And in today's world, that's more important than ever!

Of course, no review would be complete without a nod to the haters. Hardcore Gamer gave it a score of 90, saying it "expertly captures the power of language" and that its puzzles are "perfectly-challenging." But I'm guessing some critics might say that Chants of Sennaar is too academic or that its puzzles are too tricky. To those folks, I say: Get lost in this game and see what wonders you can uncover!

In conclusion, Chants of Sennaar is a puzzle game that's sure to delight language lovers and culture vultures alike. It's a game that will make you think, make you feel clever, and maybe even inspire you to learn more about the world around us.

So, if you're looking for a game that's all about words, wisdom, and wonder, then Chants of Sennaar is the perfect fit for you!
